summary: Test module that verifies the functionality of the PriorTransformer component in the Diffusers library. It includes unit tests that check model initialization, forward pass signature, pretrained loading, and output correctness, as well as integration tests that run the transformer with synthetic seed data and perform resource cleanup.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to guarantee that the PriorTransformer works reliably within diffusion pipelines, ensuring stable performance for downstream applications such as image generation models like Kandinsky.
